general_education.ge_overlap: 3 units from major prep; 3 units from JPN 102B

lower_division.name: College of Humanities & the Arts Lower Division Requirement

upper_division.name: College of Humanities & the Arts Upper Division Requirement

notes: String: Students must satisfy the specific degree requirements for their undergraduate major and fulfill University degree requirements.
String: Academic program requires total units with an average 2.0 GPA - 'C' or better.
String: 6 required units of American Institutions/US123 may be satisfied by selecting applicable GE courses in Areas 3B and/or 4.
String: Complete any one course offered by the College of Humanities & the Arts in a discipline other than your major (2-4 units).
String: Major Preparation includes 12 units of a second world language (or equivalent).
